dict.acceptation: 证明，证实；论证；显示，展示；演示，说明；

sent.orig: As I have already explained, you cannot demonstrate love until you can demonstrate not loving.
sent.trans: 如我已经解释过的，除非你能展示没有爱心，否则你无法展示爱心。

sent.orig: As the saying goes, chaos, heroes demonstrate their nature.
sent.trans: 俗话说，沧海横流，方显英雄本色。

sent.orig: Recent events demonstrate the need for a change in policy.
sent.trans: 近采的事件表明了政策改革的必要。

sent.orig: They have been very innovative technically – each competing with the other to demonstrate their talents.
sent.trans: 他们大搞技术创新，真是八仙过海，各显神通。

sent.orig: Can I watch you demonstrate before I have to do it?
sent.trans: 在我开始之前，可以先看看你示范吗？
